channel.title: Should be easy to solve?
channel.description:
[b]I have just 5 minutes ago got my server online. And now I am faced of the fact that new-members are upset because they have to be online for 60 minutes until they can drop or trade.
I am not happy about this either and am wondering, how can i lower this limit?, or even better, delete this rule altogeather?
Thanks. Dillon. :D[/b]

item.title: Should be easy to solve?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“dillsta2, post:1, topic:314617”][b]I have just 5 minutes ago got my server online. And now I am faced of the fact that new-members are upset because they have to be online for 60 minutes until they can drop or trade.

I am not happy about this either and am wondering, how can i lower this limit?, or even better, delete this rule altogeather?

Thanks. Dillon. :D[/b][/quote]

i had this in one of my sources.
when you try to drop a item, it should send a message that you cant.
in client class, search for part of the message and delete the thing, do it for trade as well.

Read full topic
